data.text: @MariaValeriaBl3 *su

@MariaValeriaBl3 Hola Maria,
responderemos a ts mensaje privado lo antes posible. Gracias por su comprensión.
@RehmLiv Hello Livia, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@RiverSong2008 Olá River, de forma a verificar o estado do seu reembolso, pedimos que nos indique o código da sua reserva ou o número do bilhete eletrónico. Por razões de segurança, solicitamos que nos envie a informação por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@Roberto52599371 Hello Roberto, 
How can we assist you? If your question is about an existing booking, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.  
Thank you.

@jumissiani Olá ôh xuliana,
De forma a verificarmos a situação, indique-nos por favor o nº do bilhete que deu origem ao voucher, nome do titular e endereço de email associado.  
Por razões de privacidade, sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada.   
Obrigado.

@TerrenzVM Hello Terrence, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. We assure you that your file is being analysed and that you will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

@osofiaf Hello Olga, 
We present our most sincere apologies for all inconveniences caused.
To verify the situation can you please confirm us the claim reference number and the e-mail address associated to it?
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.  
Thank you.

@8519Loukyo Hello Yuan, 
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@matizbetone Hello Mateusz,
To verify the situation can you please confirm us the claim reference number and the e-mail address associated to it?
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.  
Thank you.

@MandyAllstar Olá mandy, lamentamos imenso o cancelamento e todos os constrangimentos causados. De forma a verificar a situação, pedimos que nos indique, por mensagem privada, o código da sua reserva ou o número do bilhete eletrónico. Obrigado.

@michellecadavid Hello Michelle, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. We inform you that your file is being analysed and assure you that you will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

@marceloaielo Olá Marcelo, de forma a verificar a situação, pedimos que nos indique o código da sua reserva ou o número do bilhete eletrónico que deu origem ao voucher. Por razões de segurança, solicitamos que nos envie os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@carrasco_77 Mientras tanto, si necesita de algo más, por favor háganos saber. Seguimos a su disposición. Un saludo. (2/2)

@carrasco_77 Hola Carlos,
una vez más, nos disculpamos por la demora en la resolución de la situación. El tiempo de respuesta, dependiendo de la situación, puede variar, pero le aseguramos que su caso está siendo atendido y será contactado, por e-mail, así que posible. (1/2)
@Andr3Fre1tas Olá Andre, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@cedraz_diego Olá Diego, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@tushar00009 Hello Tushar, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@jaderivan Olá Jader, lamentamos a situação. Se podermos prestar assistência, não hesite em contactar. Obrigado.
@JimmyLeFunk Hello The Big D, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

data.text:
🚨 Alert: these prices are temporary but are worth permanent memories.
Book now your dream trip for 2023 and take advantage of our Black Friday deals at: https://t.co/gfGMIOACLi. 🤩 https://t.co/QrgrroIsOm
@jnfigueira Olá juan, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@Aga24540028 Cependant, nous vous assurons que vous serez contacté, par email, dans les plus brefs délais. N’hésitez pas à revenir vers nous si besoin. Merci. (II/II)

@Aga24540028 Bonjour Aga, nous nous excusons pour le retard sur la conclusion de votre dossier. Nous vous informons qu'il est en cours d'analyse. En raison du grand nombre de dossiers, le temps nécessaire pour finaliser l'analyse d'une situation peut être plus long que d'habitude. (I/II)

@lapa182 Olá Igo, 
Pedimos que nos informe sobre a sua questão e que nos indique o seu código de reserva e/ou número de bilhete para que possamos verificar se podemos ajudar por esta via. Obrigado.

@pielquehabito Olá Pati, 
Para que possamos verificar se podemos ajudar por esta via, pedimos que nos indique, preferencialmente por DM, o código de reserva ou número de bilhete do seu amigo. Obrigado.

@LauraDesmond95 Laura, we inform you that due to a high number of requests the analysis can take longer than desired, situation for which we apologize. However, we assure you your case deserves our best attention. You will be contacted by e-mail as soon as the analysis is completed. Thank you.

@coookybee Hello, 
We are sorry for any inconvenient we might have caused due to this situation. Can you provide us with the booking reference or ticket number so that we can verify if we can help you through this medium? Thank you.

@beantownzgirl Hello Jenn, 
We kindly ask you to let us know your booking reference, ticket number or refund code so that we are able to help you more promptly. Thank you.
@carlosvirreira @vliegwinkel Hello Carlos, can you please provide us the booking reference? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.

data.text: @patifariass Olá fatiparia, poderá verificar a nossa oferta online - https://t.co/Qo2zBhDWPJ . Estamos ao dispor.

@Andytothemoon Hello Andy,

can you inform us through DM your lost luggage file number (PIR), bag tag and booking reference related so we may verify? Thank you.

@FmTbE Hello,

we reiterate the information previously given. Thank you.

data.text: @DriesDeluxe Hello Dries, in order to verify the situation, please provide us with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

@medistraiam Olá aboutme,

poderia nos indicar, po mensagem privada, o seu código de reserva ou número de bilhete eletrónico (047...), para que possamos verificar, por favor? Obrigado.

@MyMaLnd Hello My, you can contact us by DM, if we can still assist you through this channel, with the booking code and/or ticket number. We are available.

@oaruom_ Oaruom, we have verified that the booking code provided was automatically cancelled, after payment failure and due to duplicate attempts online with the same details and through different selling channels. (1/2)

data.text: @miIevezn Olá duda, lamentamos imenso a situação que nos descreve e todos os constrangimentos causados. Caso possamos prestar assistência, pedimos que nos indique, por mensagem privada, o código da sua reserva ou o número do bilhete eletrónico. Obrigado.

In order to verify the situation through this channel we kindly ask you to send us the booking reference. Thank you.

urls.title: Hand baggage allowed on the aircraft
urls.description: Find out all about hand baggage on board TAP aircraft: what weight and sizes are allowed and what you can carry in the cabin.

data.text:
@Gibroni2 Hello Mary, we inform you that if our passengers reach the boarding gate with cabin baggage that exceeds the allowed weight, size or number, fees do apply.
You may verify usefull information on that matter through the following link:

https://t.co/dEYBJDYNdv

Thank you.

@Klaas44867842 Hello Klass, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. We assure you that your file has not been forgotten and that it is being analysed. You will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.
@italounhaiser Olá Ítalo, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@SoniaReade2 @rakunteur Hello Sonia, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

data.text:
Tatuámos preços nos nossos Clientes... Como reagiriam? 😱
Grandes viagens ficam para sempre, mas estes preços só até 28/11. Literalmente! 😉
Reservem já aquela viagem para 2023, a partir de 49€ (ida e volta) em: https://t.co/gfGMIOACLi. https://t.co/wCtmwa4JYi
